item.title: Monitoring Cassandra with Prometheus
item.dc:creator: Brian Brazil
item.description: Cassandra is one of many Java-based systems that offers metrics via JMX. The JMX ExporterÂ offers way to use these with Prometheus. By following these steps you can be up and running in under a minute! We'll start from scratch, first we download and extract the latest Cassandra tarball: wget http://archive.apache.org/dist/cassandra/2.2.4/apache-cassandra-2.2.4-bin.tar.gz tar -xzf apache-cassandra-*-bin.tar.gz cd apache-cassandra-* […]
